sentence.value: Salyut 7-EP2 (Soyuz T-7 up, Soyuz T-5 down), Svetlana Yevgenyevna Savitskaya (Russian: ????????? ??????????? ?????????; born August 8, 1948) is a former Soviet aviator and cosmonaut who flew aboard Soyuz T-7 in 1982, becoming the second woman in space some 19 years after Valentina Tereshkova.
